## Local Millages




```{r}

FA_Data_District %>% 
  filter(FY == fiscal.year) %>% 
  select(cy.d.1.nhs.basic, cy.d.1.nhs.hrmls, cy.d.1.hs.hrmls,
         cy.d.1.hs.hrmls18, cy.d.1.enhancemnt, cy.d.1.sinkfund, 
         cy.d.1.debtretire, cy.d.1.otherdebt, 
         cy.d.1.sev, cy.d.1.tot.nhssev, cy.d.1.hs.sev) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = everything()) %>% 
  flextable()



```

 - Millage name
 - description of millage
 - millage rate
 - taxable value for that particular millage
 - actual revenue from millage 
 - potential millage revenue 
 - revenue left on the table
